title: Enterprise asset subtypes
content:
Enterprise Asset Management is available for Service Management Premium and Asset Management licenses only.

Enterprise asset subtypes function as nested classifications within broader asset categories. They offer a more detailed and specific management of diverse asset types within an organization.

By defining subtypes, you can attain a higher level of control over the asset management processes and align with the unique requirements of different asset types. For example, Office Supplies, Lifting equipments, Furniture and fixtures, Vehicles, Building and enclosures.

Related topics

  • Enterprise Asset Subtype roles and permissions
  • Create an enterprise asset subtype
  • Edit an enterprise asset subtype
  • Enterprise asset subtypes workflow
